original_title: Spice Girls: Spiceworld Tour Live in Madrid
overview: The Spiceworld Tour was the debut concert tour by British girl group the Spice Girls. It was launched in support of their second studio album Spiceworld (1997). The tour saw the group perform to an estimated 2.1 million fans in total, covering Britain, Europe and North America.
title: Spice Girls: Spiceworld Tour Live in Madrid
